title: i called my lawyer and he said i could fairly win this i am going to sue riot for sure!.
body: for what you guys did to me i will seek justice with my lawyer and take you to court and sue you for a million dollars this i promise you.

replies.body:
Actually there's a cap of 750,000 US dollars for non-economic damages. So unless **Riot Phreak** actually broke into your house, you wont be getting that million anytime soon.

Read more about this [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-economic_damages_caps).

1. He wouldn't be suing in a US court, so that wont apply.
2. If I'm wrong, at current exchange rates $750K USD will roughly equal $1.03M AUD.

um, but why are you wanting to sue them?

1. His summoner name is from NA, it's logical to assume he lives there. 
2. If he is suing Riot Games OCE branch, then Austalian law will apply and he'll get even less in damages. The cap will be at AUS $551,500. Read more about that [here](https://www.alrc.gov.au/publications/11-remedies-and-costs/cap-damages). 

No idea why he wants to sue them ahah
Probably a joke :3

MB, didn't notice the NA next to his name (Yes,I knew it existed previously).

Wont get anything anyway unless he's got heaps of money to pay the legal fees for the challenges and all the other crap lawyers will do to you.

Yeah, prob a joke.
So what did Riot do to get this treatment now?
Im curious as to why you believe you have been wronged?
